attributes.action: Stop the EU's plans to outlaw new mums ingesting their own placentas
attributes.additional_details:
The EU are pushing through legislation to stop encapsulation services. You will be able To encapsulate your own placenta but you will not be able to get anyone to do it for you. The eu has classed placenta as a "novel food". More here
http://www.independent.co.uk/life-style/health-and-families/health-news/mothers-face-ban-on-taking-placenta-pills-9537726.html
